item.title: 3rd Summer School in Social Complexity Sciences
item.description: An interdisciplinary research and training experience. The Summer School in Social Complexity Sciences emerges as the evolution of the 2019–2020 research camps. Today it is an intensive learning space that expands the methodological tools of students and researchers. Since 2023, it has been open to participants from other postgraduate programs and external institutions, consolidating itself as an interdisciplinary meeting point and a link with the community. Registration Form/Scholarship Application EV 2026 General Information Dates: January 5 to 16, 2026 Schedule: 08:30 – 16:30 hrs (Monday to Friday) Modality: In-person Location: Rector Ernesto Silva Bafalluy Campus (RESB) + Plaza de la Investigación Address: Av.

item.title: FullCICS Session: Unpacking the Unpredictable with Bastián González Bustamante
item.description: On October 9th we will have a FullCICS discussion session open to the entire community, organized by PoliCICS. On this occasion, we will have an international guest from Leiden University. Bastián González Bustamante will present his work ‘Unpacking the Unpredictable: From Machine Learning to Generative AI for Detecting Crises in Presidential Democracies’, hosted at OBPEX: https://obpex.com/enlace-udp.
